text: Ara deyala sanbandhe -- e chila saharera du'ijana etima balakera, ara tara talaya chila tadera ubhayera dhanabhandara, ara tadera pita chila sajjana. Kaje'i tomara prabhu ceyechilena ye tara yena tadera sabalakatba prapta haya ebam tadera dhanabhandara bera kare ane tomara prabhura tarapha theke karuna hisebe, ara ami eti kari ni amara nijera icchaya. E'i hacche tara tatparya ye sanbandhe tumi dhairyadharana karate para ni.â€™â€™
